description.value: Primary Energy: Space 4 (manipulating physical form/appearance) Supporting Energy: Time 2 (duration 1 minute) Range: Self Duration: 1 minute Total Cost: 6 Energy Action: Complex weave (2 actions) Weaving Roll: Space Potential + Space Mastery / Time Potential + Time Mastery Effect: Alter your appearance, gain aquatic adaptation, or grow natural weapons ([[/damage 4]] damage). Appearance changes are cosmetic only (height 1 foot, weight 50 lbs, features change). Natural weapons count as light weapons. Saving Throw: None (self-only transformation) Success Scaling: 0 = fails, 1 = 1 round duration, 2 = full effect, 3 = 10 minutes, 4 = 1 hour
